message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $80. Considering its high quality and unique features, I would like to propose an offer of $95 for it. I believe this price reflects the value it brings and I hope you find it reasonable. Looking forward to your response!

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the quality of the product, $95 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. I'm happy to purchase it for $80, which is my maximum budget.  Let me know what you think.
